result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?

result.eng: I was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ḃeár le cúpla cara agus ḃí an ċraic go hiontaċI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.

result.eng: It is a few kilometers from the village.

result.eng: I hurt my neck a few months ago.
result.ga: Ghortaigh mé mo mhuineál cúpla mí ó shin

result.eng: I have not had a holiday for a few years.
result.ga: Ní raibh saoire ar bith agam le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Ní raibh saoire ar bith agam le cúpla bliain
result.html: Ní raibh saoire ar bith agam le cúpla bliainI have not had a holiday for a few years.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ saoire ar biṫ agam le cúpla bliainI have not had a holiday for a few years.

result.eng: Did you meet with a few old friends?
result.ga: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.orig: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.html: Ar chas tú le cúpla seancharaDid you meet with a few old friends?

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: I live a few miles from Galway.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí cúpla míle ó Ghaillimh
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí cúpla míle ó Ghaillimh

result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí cúpla míle ó ĠailliṁI live a few miles from Galway.

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann ionad siopadóireachta cúpla teach tábhairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snámha

result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann ionad siopadóireaċta cúpla teaċ táḃairne bialann álainn óstán agus linn snáṁaThere are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.

result.eng: It's only a few miles from Galway.
result.ga: Níl sé ach cúpla míle ó Ghaillimh
result.orig: Níl sé ach cúpla míle ó Ghaillimh

result.ponchtml: Níl sé aċ cúpla míle ó ĠailliṁIt's only a few miles from Galway.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin

result.eng: Very few people in the world remmeber the day of that assassination.
result.ga: Is beag duine ar domhan gur cuimhin leis lá an dhúnmharaithe sin

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
